function_reachability: Is it impossible for function '__builtin_memset' to reach function '__builtin_abort'?

loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < 100000' is never executed?

dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < 100000' without passing through its header block?

data_dependency: Is variable 'p (line 2)' used after its definition?

liveness: Does variable 'q' remain in use at the end of function 'foo'?
Is variable 'p' live at the end of function 'foo'?
dead_code: Is the statement 'for (i = 0; i < 100000; i++)' unreachable?
